import React from 'react' import styled from 'styled-components' import loading_animation from './' const Articles = ({posts}) => { return( Welcome to articles component !!! {posts.map((article, key) => (

{article.title}

{article.description}

{article.author}
Edit Article
Delete Article
))} ) } export default Articles //Main container const MainContainer = styled.div` margin: 7rem 0; `;
